creator: John Galsworthy
description:
LibriVox recording of The Silver Box by John Galsworthy.
Read in English by Availle; Beth Thomas; Kristin Gjerløw; Michele Eaton; Steve Gough; Peter Tucker; davidpr; Sonia; K. Adrian Stroet; Bev J Stevens; ToddHW; Joseph Tabler; David Olson; Mary Kay; Mike Harris; John Burlinson; Dillon McFarlane; David Purdy
This is a lovely comedy about the theft of a prostitute's purse by a rich 'young man of good family. It is placed beside the theft of a silver cigarette case from the rich man's father's house by 'a poor devil', with very different repercussions. - Summary by Michele Eaton

Editor and Narrator: Michele Eaton
John Barthwick; Livens: Steve Gough
Mrs Barthwick: Kristin Gjerløw
Jack Barthwick: davidpr
Roper: Joseph Tabler
Mrs Jones: Beth Thomas
Marlow: K. Adrian Stroet
Wheeler: Sonia
Jones: Peter Tucker
Mrs Seddon: Bev J Stevens
Snow: ToddHW
A Police Magistrate: John Burlinson
An Unknown Lady: Availle
A Relieving Officer: David Olson
Swearing Clerk: Mary Kay
An Usher: Dillon McFarlane
Bald Constable: David Purdy
Clerk: MikeyHaz

For further information, including links to online text, reader information, RSS feeds, CD cover or other formats (if available), please go to the LibriVox catalog page for this recording.

For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org.
subject: librivox; audiobooks;comedy; play; funny
title: The Silver Box
